text: [Music]
module is a safety at work company we
have developed a smart belt that goes
through the pant loops of a uniform and
the data is transmitted to the cloud so
when employee can see the type of
activities they're doing throughout the
day on their dashboard or mobile app we
already have 40 large fortune 500
customers using our system we had had a
lot of outages and we were on a prior
system that caused a lot of problems
with our customers being down in a
safety environment is really critical
one of the biggest problems with IOT
systems is the amount of data that IOT
crates and on an eight-hour ship we send
28,600 payloads up into the AWS cloud
just for one belt now when you think
about thousands about sending this the
whole AWS system basically handles that
in near real-time performance and what's
really neat about our AWS IOT system is
that we have the amount of computation
horsepower behind it to be able to find
what I like to call the zebras amongst
the horses so how do you find that it's
what's different and utilizing the
computational power the AWS provides we
can immediately find those zebras
amongst those horses because of the
computational power AWS provides us we
can provide to our customers safety data
five times faster the biggest byproduct
of that is customer satisfaction
customers getting their data sooner
customers able to make sure that their
employees are safe we are very proud of
our safety record but on our first stage
or just tracking minor injuries our
sprains and strains have dropped by 30%
as we continue to add smart belts to our
systems and new customers to our system
we have not seen any performance
degradation at all our downtime is I
can't remember when the last time we had
one and it's nothing that we lose sleep
over or even think about anymore the
trains just run on time for us and so if
I have a demo scheduled here today I'm
not sitting there worried about whether
my platform is going to be up and
working I just know it is and that just
gives me a tremendous amount of peace of
mind with that AWS IOT platform the
module smart belt is a game changer for
safety managers and professionals
they're able to see data they otherwise
had not seen they're able to see
different types of activities and the
risky behaviors of their employees that
they didn't necessarily know existed
before our customers are making
immediate changes to their processes
immediate changes to their employee
behaviors it's just really been neat to
work with all these safety professionals
and see their injuries going down
hearing their testimonials and really
just keeping employees safe and that's
exactly what our core mission is
